## Data

```{r}
# Upload the data
setwd(here::here("data/"))
GermanCreditRaw <- read_csv2("GermanCredit.csv")
```

<div>

The initial dataset about German credit data contains `r ncol(GermanCreditRaw)` variables and `r nrow(GermanCreditRaw)` observations.

</div>

```{r}
# Removing the first column, aka "OBS#

GermanCredit <- GermanCreditRaw %>% 
  select(-c("OBS#"))
```

```{r}
# Write csv file
setwd(here::here("data/"))
write_csv(GermanCredit, "GermanCreditClean.csv")
```
